chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
A: Type
s1: state
sc: schedule
s2: state
t: proc this W A

Goal:
pstep s1 Unfinished sc s2 t <-> False

Premises:
pstep : forall (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop
world = (context * hooks)%type : Type
Inductive schedule : Set := ActStep : schedule | SeqRet : schedule | SeqStep : schedule -> schedule | InjectStep : schedule -> schedule | InjectRet : schedule | WithInvStep : schedule -> schedule | WithInvRet : schedule
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc this W A | Ret : A -> proc this W A | Act : action W A this -> proc this W A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A -> proc this W A | WithInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc this (mkWorld p) A -> proc this W A Arguments proc _ _ _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
Inductive False : Prop := 
nid = nat : Set
pstep_safe : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc this W A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A), pstep s1 t sc s2 q -> safe t sc s1
proc_progress : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (sc : schedule), s \In Coh W -> safe p sc s -> good p sc -> exists (s' : state) (p' : proc this W A), pstep s p sc s' p'
step : forall (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop
Seq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A
Act : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), action W A this -> proc this W A
Inject : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A -> proc this W A
Ret : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), A -> proc this W A
proc_rec : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Set), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc this V A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_ind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc this V A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_rect : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Type), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc this V A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_sind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> SProp), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
WithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc this (mkWorld p) A -> proc this W A
good : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> schedule -> Prop
pcat : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), proc this W A -> (A -> Pred (proc this W B)) -> Simpl_Pred (proc this W B)
safe : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> Prop
Actions.tryrecv_act_step_safe : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)), Actions.tryrecv_act_step W this filter s1 s2 r -> Actions.tryrecv_act_safe W s1
Rely.rely_trans : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 s3 : state), Rely.network_rely w this s1 s2 -> Rely.network_rely w this s2 s3 -> Rely.network_rely w this s1 s3
Idle : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2
Injection.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
step_preserves_labels : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_step w this s1 s2 -> dom s1 =i dom s2
Actions.step_sem : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s1 : state) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
a_step_sem : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s1 : state) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
Record injects (U V : world) (K : hooks) : Type := Inject { E : world; _ : hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E; _ : V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K); _ : hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K; _ : forall s : state, Coh V s < -> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2]); _ : forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 ->...-> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step E this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2 } Arguments Injection.Inject [U V K E] _ _ _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
Rely.rely_coh : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), Rely.network_rely w this s1 s2 -> Coh w s1 /\ Coh w s2
step_coh : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_step w this s1 s2 -> Coh w s1 /\ Coh w s2
stepV1 : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_step w this s1 s2 -> valid s1
List.Exists_nil : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), List.Exists P [::] < -> False
Rely.rely_coh' : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (n : nat) (s1 s2 : state), Rely.network_rely' w this n s1 s2 -> Coh w s1 /\ Coh w s2
stepV2 : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_step w this s1 s2 -> valid s2
step_is_local : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label), network_step w this s1 s2 -> forall z : nat_eqType, z != this -> find z (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)) = find z (dstate (getStatelet s2 l))
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]
Actions.skip_step_sem : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (p : protocol) (pf : getProtocol W l = p) (V : Type) (f : forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) (s1 : state) (S : Actions.skip_safe W s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), Actions.skip_step pf f S s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
step_preserves_node_ids : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (l : Label), l \in dom s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2 -> dom (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)) =i dom (dstate (getStatelet s2 l))
a_step_other : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (V : Type) (a : Actions.action W V this) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : state) (r : V) (n : nat_eqType) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), this != n -> Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> getLocal n (getStatelet s1 l) = getLocal n (getStatelet s2 l)
Actions.step_other : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (V : Type) (a : Actions.action W V this) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : state) (r : V) (n : nat_eqType) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), this != n -> Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> getLocal n (getStatelet s1 l) = getLocal n (getStatelet s2 l)
sem_extend : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks), injects U V K -> forall (s1 s2 s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> s2 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)
sem_split : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects U V K) (s1 : state) (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \In Coh U -> s2 \In Coh U -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step (inj_ext w) this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2
Actions.Action : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a_safe : state -> Prop), (forall s : state, a_safe s -> s \In Coh W) -> forall a_step : forall s1 : state, a_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop, (forall (s : state) (pf : a_safe s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step s pf s' r) -> (forall (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step s1 pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2) -> Actions.action W V this
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P

``` 
intros.
split; intros.
- admit.
- inversion H.
```

original: intros. split; intros. - admit. - inversion H.
